steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.modified_description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board after toasting it on pan for 30 seconds

errors.description: Placed on kitchen counter
Toast tortilla on the pan before using it
Toast tortilla for 30 seconds on pan

steps.description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use a spoon to scoop nut butter from the jar

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a butter knife

steps.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges using spoon

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a butter knife

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: Clean-Clean the spoon by wiping it with a paper towel

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a knife

steps.description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use the spoon to scoop jelly from the jar

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a butter knife

steps.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter using the spoon

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a butter knife

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: Clean-Clean the spoon by wiping with a paper towel

errors.description: Used a spoon instead of a butter knife

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but so that the filling leaks

errors.description: Filling spilled

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.modified_description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart

errors.description: Incorrectly insert so tortilla doesn't close properly

steps.description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the knife, leaving 1 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll

errors.description: Left 1 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
Use a normal knife instead of butter knife

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
steps.modified_description: Place knife perpendicular to the length of the roll

errors.description: Use knife instead of floss

steps.description: Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the knife halfway between toothpicks

errors.description: Use knife instead of floss

steps.description: Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
steps.modified_description: Cut-Cut the the tortilla roll using knife

errors.description: Cut using knife

steps.description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
